mapper.sql: agent_id, agent_no, agent_name, agent_state, agent_level, agent_discount_type, agent_discount, agent_payments, agent_return, agent_returnvalue, agent_fmdate, agent_todate, agent_contract, agent_certify, link_name, link_tel, rev_province, agent_desc, org_id, shop_id, creator, create_time, modifier, modify_time, agent_brand, order_date, coop_state, user_id, agenet_returnvalue, agent_addr
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from oa_agent_mas
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into oa_agent_mas (agent_no, agent_name, agent_state, agent_level, agent_discount_type, agent_discount, agent_payments, agent_return, agent_returnvalue, agent_fmdate, agent_todate, agent_contract, agent_certify, link_name, link_tel, rev_province, agent_desc, org_id, shop_id, creator, create_time, modifier, modify_time, agent_brand, order_date, coop_state, user_id, agenet_returnvalue, agent_addr ) values (#{agentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentDiscountType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentDiscount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{agentPayments,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentReturn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentReturnvalue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{agentFmdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{agentTodate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{agentContract,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentCertify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{revProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifier,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{agentBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{coopState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{agenetReturnvalue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{agentAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

agent_id,
agent_no,

user_id,
agenet_returnvalue,
agent_addr,

mapper.update:
update oa_agent_mas
agent_no = #{agentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
agent_name = #{agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
agent_state = #{agentState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
agent_level = #{agentLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
agent_discount_type = #{agentDiscountType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
agent_discount = #{agentDiscount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
agent_payments = #{agentPayments,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
agent_return = #{agentReturn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
agent_returnvalue = #{agentReturnvalue,jdbcType=INTEGER},
agent_fmdate = #{agentFmdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
agent_todate = #{agentTodate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
agent_contract = #{agentContract,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
agent_certify = #{agentCertify,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
link_name = #{linkName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
link_tel = #{linkTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rev_province = #{revProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
agent_desc = #{agentDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=INTEGER},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
agent_brand = #{agentBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_date = #{orderDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
coop_state = #{coopState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
agenet_returnvalue = #{agenetReturnvalue,jdbcType=INTEGER},
agent_addr = #{agentAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where agent_id = #{agentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update oa_agent_mas set agent_no = #{agentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, agent_name = #{agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, agent_state = #{agentState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, agent_level = #{agentLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, agent_discount_type = #{agentDiscountType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, agent_discount = #{agentDiscount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, agent_payments = #{agentPayments,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, agent_return = #{agentReturn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, agent_returnvalue = #{agentReturnvalue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, agent_fmdate = #{agentFmdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, agent_todate = #{agentTodate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, agent_contract = #{agentContract,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, agent_certify = #{agentCertify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, link_name = #{linkName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, link_tel = #{linkTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rev_province = #{revProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, agent_desc = #{agentDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=INTEGER}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, agent_brand = #{agentBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_date = #{orderDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, coop_state = #{coopState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, agenet_returnvalue = #{agenetReturnvalue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, agent_addr = #{agentAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where agent_id = #{agentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT A.* FROM oa_agent_mas AS A,t_agent_fac AS B WHERE A.agent_id=B.agent_id AND B.factory_id=#{factoryId}

select * from oa_agent_mas where agent_id in (select agent_id from t_agent_fac where factory_id in (select fact_id from oa_factory_info where shop_id in (select id from t_shop where member_id=#{memberId})))

select a.agent_id,a.agent_name from oa_agent_mas as a left join t_agent_fac as b on a.agent_id = b.agent_id left join t_member as mem on mem.own_shopid=b.sys_id where mem.id=#{memberId} and b.status=1

SELECT oa_agent_mas.agent_no, oa_agent_mas.agent_name, oa_agent_mas.agent_state,t_agent_fac.`status`,t_agent_fac.factory_id,oa_agent_mas.agent_contract,oa_agent_mas.link_name, oa_agent_mas.link_tel, oa_agent_mas.rev_province, oa_agent_mas.agent_desc FROM oa_agent_mas left JOIN t_agent_fac ON t_agent_fac.agent_id = oa_agent_mas.agent_id where t_agent_fac.factory_id in (select fact_id from oa_factory_info where shop_id in (select id from t_shop where member_id=#{memberId})) order by t_agent_fac.`status` ,t_agent_fac.create_time desc
update t_agent_fac set `status`=#{status} where factory_id in (select fact_id from oa_factory_info where shop_id in (select id from t_shop where member_id=#{memberId})) and agent_id=#{agentId}

select a.*,b.`status` from oa_agent_mas as a,t_agent_fac as b where a.agent_id in (select agent_id from t_agent_fac where factory_id in (select fact_id from oa_factory_info where shop_id in (select id from t_shop where member_id=#{memberId}))) and a.agent_id=b.agent_id

SELECT m.agent_id agentId, u.user_name linkName, m.contract_name agentContract, f.agent_contract contractUrl, f.agent_fmdate agentFmdate, f.agent_todate agentTodate, u.link_tel linkTel, f.agent_name agentName, m.agent_addr agentAddr, i.rev_addr receiveAddr, f.agent_discount_type agentDiscountType, f.agent_discount agentDiscount FROM v_oa_agent_mas m LEFT JOIN t_agent_fac f on m.agent_id = f.agent_id LEFT JOIN oa_agent_revinfo i on m.agent_id = i.agent_id and f.sys_id = i.sys_id LEFT JOIN oa_agent_userinfo u on m.agent_id = u.agent_id and f.sys_id = u.sys_id WHERE m.agent_id = #{agentId} and f.factory_id = #{factoryId} ORDER BY u.main_user DESC,i.rev_default DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT pic_id picId, pic_path picUrl FROM oa_agent_certify WHERE agent_id = #{agentId} and sys_id = #{shopId}

select a.* from oa_agent_mas as a left join oa_market_agent as b on a.agent_id=b.agent_id left join oa_market_act as c on b.act_id = c.act_id left join t_agent_fac as e on e.sys_id = c.shop_id where e.sys_id in (select own_shopid from t_member as t where t.id=#{memberId}) and c.act_id=#{actId} GROUP BY agent_id
